Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>You already caught all the hot-footed
frogs? <sp:5:1:0>That's some quick work!<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>And here I am, not having caught even one...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>Does this look like <clr:0000>10 frogs <clr:ffff>to you?
I don't need all my fingers to know you
came up short!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Ms. Ivee wants her frogs. Let's not keep
her waiting. <sp:5:0:0>Go on and gather the rest
of those hot-footed little guys.
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>Aha! <sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>10 frogs<clr:ffff>, all accounted for! Allow me
to take those off your hands.
Talk_0079:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>What's the matter? <sp:5:0:0>You can tell me—I'm
the most fashionable young guy around.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>You know it. <sp:5:1:0>I'm at peak fashion, but I still
have a hard time...you know.
Talk_0062:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Sure, things are peaceful in the ol' village,
but it's a jungle out there in the world.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>That's why I stick around here, checkin'
out the scene, making sure no strangers
put the moves on <clr:0000>Ms.<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Ivee<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait, I mean...<sp:5:1:0> I'm on guard duty to make
sure no strangers come in from outside to
disturb the peace.
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>She wants <clr:0000>hot-footed frogs<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>And <clr:0000>100 of
them<clr:ffff>, at that?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Yeah, that checks out! <sp:5:0:0>Ms. Ivee's love for
animals is just one of the many charming
things about her.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Or so my friend's friend is always saying.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>That was a close one! I better play it smooth.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Still, <sp:5:0:0>collecting 100 <clr:0000>hot-footed frogs<clr:ffff>
seems like a big job, even for someone
you love.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>But not if I had help! You traveler types
go into <clr:0000>wells <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>all the time, right?<sp:0:4:0>That's just the kind of place where you
find frogs. You don't even have to go far!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Didn't I hear about a bunch of frogs in a well
somewhere in this village? Maybe I should check
it out later.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>What? I didn't say anything. Haha.<sp:5:0:0> Look,
let's focus on how helpful it would be if
you gathered <clr:0000>10 of those frogs<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>No matter the weather or the time of day,<sp:5:1:0>
I'm always here, checkin' out the scene.<sp:5:0:0>
That's me. Good ol' Manny.
Talk_0063:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'm here on guard duty, checkin' out
Ms. Ivee.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Sorry, let me do that one over. <sp:5:1:0>I'm on
guard duty protectin' the village.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>There's no problem if you wanna talk to
<clr:0000>Ms.<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Ivee<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Just...keep the naive, "I just moved here,
and won't somebody show me around?"
act to a minimum.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Not that anyone could be as young, guyish, or
fashionesque as me.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0064:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Whoa. You don't let go of much,
do you, buddy?<sp:0:4:0>And here I'd collected 10 rushrooms as
a reward for you.<sp:0:4:0>Oh well. Guess you'll be keeping those
hot-footed frogs you caught.
Talk_0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>There's no problem if you wanna talk to
<clr:0000>Ms. Ivee<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Just ease up on the whole "fashionable
dude" thing, all right? No one cares how
great your hat looks like, pal.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Not that anyone can pull off Cece's looks as well
as me. I'm not just fashionable—I'm fashion-able.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So now you know the situation. If you
find any <clr:0000>hot-footed frogs<clr:ffff>, you know
what to do.
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Whether it's raining spears or just regular
rain, I never slack off guardin' the place.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Not that it ever rains spears, granted.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0050: <sp:3:0:2:0400><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Again? He's asked me that already... Is this guy OK?<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmmm... Does this mean I've gotta catch them
myself? Seems that way.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>What's the matter? <sp:5:0:0>You can tell me,
weirdly handsome dude.
Talk_0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There'd be a reward in it for you! <sp:5:0:0>Won't
you do it for my friend's friend's sake?
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Hey, not so fast. <sp:5:0:0>As a kind of follow-up to
that friend-of-a-friend conversation we
were having...<sp:0:4:0>Remember? How we were wondering what
kind of present would make Ms. Ivee from
the general store<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>happy?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have any answers, buddy, now's
the time for 'em. <sp:5:0:0>It's not like I can <clr:0000>just
go ask her directly<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0052:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0500>Hmmm... Could this be...what that other guy calls
"putting the moves" on me?<sp:0:4:0>Well, if that is what's going on, maybe he'll cut it
out if I answer him again...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I've got no problem with you meeting
Ms. Ivee. <sp:5:0:0>Just keep the naive-guy act
to a minimum.
Talk_0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Uh, I'm... <sp:5:0:0>I'm not sure. What kind of a question
is that? But he's still looking at me, so I should
say something...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm not trying to be rude, buddy, but...<sp:0:4:0>What were you doing with Ms. Ivee from
the general store?<sp:0:4:0>Sure I noticed. I've been checkin' her out
for...a long...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400>I mean, a friend-of-a-friend tipped me off!
Talk_0081:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So weird. Who'd have thought Ms. Ivee's
heart's desire would be 100 hot-footed
frogs?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Her love for animals is just one of the
things that makes her so great!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Or so my friend's friend claims, anyway.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>That was a close one! I better play it smooth.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Niiice. Guess it's up to me to collect
the rest.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You look like you've been places. <sp:5:0:0>Sure,
things are peaceful in the ol' village, but
it's a jungle out there in the world.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>That's why I stick around here, checkin'
out the scene, making sure no strangers
put the moves on <clr:0000>Ms. Ivee<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Wait, I mean...<sp:5:1:0>that's why I make sure no
strangers come in from outside to disturb
the peace.
Talk_0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're a traveler, right, buddy? You go
into <clr:0000>wells <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> sometimes?<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>That's just the kinds of places where you
find frogs. So it should be no problem for
you to grab 10 of them, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Didn't I hear about a bunch of frogs in a well
somewhere in this village? Eh, this weirdo doesn't
need to know about that. I'll check it out myself.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>What? I didn't say anything. Haha. <sp:5:0:0>Look,
there'd be a reward in it for you! <sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Won't you gather <clr:0000>10 hot-footed frogs<clr:ffff>?
For my friend's friend's sake?
Talk_0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>The thing about being on love guard
duty is...<sp:0:4:0>Uh...<sp:5:0:0>how'd "love" get in there? Forget it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0200>The thing about guard duty is,<sp:5:0:0> I have to
make sure no creepy creeps get in here
and spoil everyone's good time!
Talk_0083:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey...buddy...do I hear the faint croaks
of little frogs? <sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Specifically, 10 <clr:0000>hot-footed frogs <clr:ffff>in that
pouch of yours?
Talk_0084:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>hey there, buddy. <sp:5:0:0>Is today the day?
Am I gonna get 10 <clr:0000>hot-footed frogs<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>OK, so if you've got the frogs, then let's
see them.
Talk_0044: <sp:3:0:2:0900>I told you to put a "Ms." on her name!
Talk_0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Buddy... <sp:5:0:0>I know you've been talking with
Ms. Ivee from the general store. I know.<sp:0:4:0>It's gonna keep me up at night if I don't
know what the two of you talked about.
I'm gonna dwell on it for days.
<sp:3:0:2:0400>And when I say "me," I mean, my friend's
friend who cares about this stuff. So spill
all the details!
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Ms. Ivee is the poster girl for the
<clr:0000>East Wind<clr:ffff> general store.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I've got no problem with you meeting
Ms. Ivee.<sp:5:0:0> Just ease up on the whole
"fashionable dude" thing, all right?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Not that anyone can pull off Cece's looks as well
as me. I'm not just fashionable—I'm fashion-able.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0047:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0400>Huh? What do I like? Where did that come from?<sp:5:1:0>
Umm... Hmmm...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Near_0003: Heh! What a cute li'l guy!
Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Ummm... Maybe <clr:0000>frogs<clr:ffff>? Sure, why not?
I like frogs.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>If I had <clr:0000>100 hot-footed frogs<clr:ffff>, I would be<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
incredibly happy!
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseS_01>You went and ASKED what Ms. Ivee likes?<sp:5:0:0>
Right to her face?! <sp:5:0:0>What's the idea?!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Uh-oh. <sp:5:0:0>Gotta play it smooth. <sp:5:0:0>Can't let him guess
I'm the one dying to know.<sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>All right, then. So what is it? What does
Ms. Ivee want? <sp:5:0:0>I can't leave my friend's
friend hanging.
Talk_0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>How I've been dreaming of a date with my
beloved Ms. Ivee...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>That's why I, Manny,<sp:5:1:0> will check every well
in sight!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Uh-oh. <sp:5:0:0>No coming back from that one.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Oops. I couldn't think of anything, so I just told him
what my dad likes instead.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0032:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmm...but this doesn't solve my problem.<sp:5:0:0>
Just what shall I gift my beloved?<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>Byyy the waaay... <sp:5:1:0>Quick question for you,
big guy.<sp:0:4:0>What kind of present do you think would
make Ms. Ivee at <clr:0000>East Wind<clr:ffff> happy?<sp:0:4:0>I'm not asking for me, you understand.<sp:5:0:0>
A friend of a friend wanted advice, and
I'm having a tough time with the answer.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Obviously, I can't <clr:0000>just go ask her directly<clr:ffff>.
Let me know if you think of something.
